Summaries: 3 Verses in 1 section. This is a Madani Surah and according to most of the authorities this is the last Surah that was revealed to the Prophet –peace be upon him. The Surah reminds about the attitude of the Believer in the situation of success. One should be thankful to Allah and seek His forgiveness for any shortcomings or mistakes.

Verses.Text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

Translations.Text: When God’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺
and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing God’s Way in crowds
then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance
